subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous ruler from Rajasthan is associated with the construction of Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मौलम कोणत्र चिट्टोरगढ किलेंद्रा निविधान के प्राकृतिक उपस्थान के लिए प्रसारित है।
explanation_en: Kumbha is a popular mythological figure, while Rao Kailas is associated with the historical construction of Chittorgarh Fort. Rao Kailas is the correct answer.
